short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that gives you a daily chance to win

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you believe in miracles, luck? This extension allows you to participate in your favorite sweepstakes at any time convenient for you.
I hope my extension will be in demand and I will be able to improve it.
It is very important for me to know your opinion about the extension.
The next step is to set up a cash back for each ticket purchased.
I encourage those who participate in lotteries on a monthly basis to use my extension. This will allow us to move towards development together.
Please write what you are missing in the functionality.
With best wishes.
